      • readFromModel

        public static Offering readFromModel(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Resource resource,
                     com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model)
        Reads an Offering object from the Semantic Model.
        Parameters:
        resource - The Resource object of the Linked USDL ServiceOffering.
        model - Model where the resource is located.
        Returns:
        An Offering object populated with its information extracted from the Semantic Model.
        Throws:
        InvalidLinkedUSDLModelException

        Parameters:
